abstract: Japan’s Nikkei stock index lost 1.2 percent on Monday, closing at its lowest level since the first week of October 1982, The New York Times’s Mark McDonald reports.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s Nikkei stock index lost 1.2 percent on Monday, closing at its lowest level since the first week of October 1982, The New York Times’s Mark McDonald reports.

headline.main: Nikkei Nears 27-Year Low as Asia Markets Slide
